page.title: 19COTSWOLD HOLIDAY HOMES
page.content: {THE RIDGE}A CONVERTED STABLE BLOCK IS A SUMMER AND WEEKEND HOME FOR THE MAJOR LANDOWNER OF THE AREA MR COREY. BIG HOUSE IN RUINS{PLUM {TREE COTTAGE}FOUNDATIONS 17TH CENTURY RECENTLY RENOVATED MR AND MRS STOKES LOVE LIVING THERE.7 ACRES OF LAND 1 DOG 1 HORSE WILD STRAWBERRIES IN GARDEN.{ THE ROUND HOUSE.}WEEKEND HOME FILM PRODUCER RECENTLY BURGLED. REBUILT FROM A RUIN IN THE LAST 15 YEARS.{ THE BEACHES.}TWO SEMI_DETACHED COUNCIL HOUSES.{ ENCHANTED COTTAGE. {TRACKWAY}ONLY.{ WHITEWAY COTTAGE.} RIGHT ON THE WHITEWAY.{ RIDINGS} {VIEW,}MR JONES. {ELECTRICITY SHOP LONG {STREET. RADIO MAST AT THE JUNCTION OF THE A$4135 and B4058 this serves the radio telephones of the police,water board, gas, electricity etc. Also as a t.v. booster for Uley village.%
